title: The Deported: America's Immigration Battle Fault Lines AJ 2014
description:
The Deported: America's Immigration Battle Fault Lines AJ 2014



80mb/24mn/mp4



Fault Lines investigates what happens to families torn apart by a broken immigration system in the United States.



In 2014, it is expected that the number of immigrants deported under US President Barack Obama will likely surpass two million; that is more than the total number of deportations prior to 1997.



This will result in more families being divided, with many who have lived for decades in the United States forced to return to a homeland they barely recognize.



Meanwhile, in the halls of Congress, the immigration reform debate is still at a standstill, and a civil disobedience movement has spread across the country pushing for Obama to halt deportations until reform passes.



shunster
